name: RoboHelp Browse Sequence File
summary: Learn about .BRS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Browse sequences can be created by choosing Tools â†’ Browse Sequence Editor.
NOTE: BRS files are saved in a plain text format and can be viewed with a text editor.

description: File created by RoboHelp, an application used for creating Windows help documentation; saves a browse sequence, which allows the help readers to move through a series of help topics; included as part of a RoboHelp project (.XPJ).
